nodes.title: Brainstorm variations
nodes.summary: Quickly explore several angles for a raw idea.
nodes.prompt: You are a collaborative ideation partner. Given the seed idea below, suggest five distinct directions with a short rationale for each. Use crisp language and focus on differentiation. Seed idea: {{idea}}

nodes.title: Turn a favorite idea into an outline
nodes.summary: Expand the strongest variation from the brainstorm into a structured outline.
nodes.prompt: We selected the direction '{{direction}}'. Produce a detailed outline with 5-7 sections. Each section should include a summary sentence and 2-3 bullet talking points.

nodes.title: Research questions
nodes.summary: Capture unknowns that block progress on the idea.
nodes.prompt: For the concept '{{concept}}', list the most important unanswered questions grouped by theme. Prioritize feasibility, impact, and audience resonance.

nodes.title: Draft a persuasive summary
nodes.summary: Craft an approachable one-page summary to share with stakeholders.
nodes.prompt: Write a persuasive one-page summary of '{{topic}}'. Use an inviting tone, highlight the problem, proposed solution, differentiators, and a clear call-to-action.

nodes.title: Headline variations
nodes.summary: Give headline options aligned with the summary's angle.
nodes.prompt: Generate ten concise headlines for the summary above. Provide a mix of bold, descriptive, and curiosity-driven angles.

nodes.title: Anticipate objections
nodes.summary: List possible objections readers may raise and craft responses.
nodes.prompt: From the perspective of a skeptical stakeholder, list key objections or questions after reading the summary and provide thoughtful rebuttals.

nodes.title: Retro prompt
nodes.summary: Run a quick retrospective on a completed sprint or project.
nodes.prompt: Facilitate a retro for '{{project}}'. Provide bullet lists for What went well, What was challenging, and Experiments for next time. Keep it constructive and specific.

nodes.title: Action items
nodes.summary: Translate retro insights into accountable tasks.
nodes.prompt: Convert the retro findings into a prioritized list of action items. Include owner suggestions and success signals for each item.
